full_summary:
**Maritime Container Tender Announcement**
=========================================

**Tender Notice Reference**: W0106-22J020
-----------------------------------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued a **Request for Proposal (RFP)** for the acquisition and delivery of Maritime Containers (PHL) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Key Dates**
------------

*   Tender closing date: November 10, 2022, at 14:00 (2:00 PM)
*   Expected contract start and end dates: Not specified and May 31, 2023, respectively

**Notice Details**
----------------

*   Tender status: Expired
*   Procurement category: Goods and Services (GD)
*   Method of procurement: Competitive - Open bidding
*   Notice type: Request for Proposal
*   Selection criteria: Lowest price

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

*   Delivery location: Valcartier, Quebec, Canada
*   Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   End-user entity: Department of National Defence (DND)

**Contact**
---------

To obtain more information about the tender, please contact Uribe, Rafael (SPAC/PSPC) at rafael.uribe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Tender Documents**
---------------------

The tender notice and supporting documents can be accessed through the link <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14333957?extsite=MTQzMzM5NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>. It is the buyer's responsibility to download and review the tender documents prior to submitting a proposal. Failure to do so may result in a non-responsive bid.
